title: Bowl with Lug Handles
period: Old Kingdom, or Saitic Period in the style of Old Kingdom
description:
Compressed globular bowl on low, slightly hollowed foot. Inset wide mouth with torn rim. On either side of body a lug simulating horizontal string-hole handle. 
Condition: Broken in two and repaired. Chips at rim.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
